member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:CSETWeb_Api.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Houses all API calls used by the ModuleBuilder logic.

member.name: M:CSETWeb_Api.Controllers.ModuleBuilderController.GetCustomSetsList
member.summary:
Returns a list of custom modules.
In the future, we may want to return all modules to allow the user to clone a 'stock' module. Currently we cannot prevent the user from overwriting stock requirements or questions, so that functionality is turned off.

member.name: M:CSETWeb_Api.Controllers.ModuleBuilderController.UpdateSetDetail(CSETWeb_Api.BusinessLogic.Models.SetDetail)
member.summary: Saves the set information and returns the setname (key) of the record.

member.name: M:CSETWeb_Api.Controllers.ModuleBuilderController.GetMyQuestionsUsedByOtherSets(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of questions whose 'original_set_name' is the one specified, but are also being used in other sets.

member.name: M:CSETWeb_Api.Controllers.ModuleBuilderController.AddDeleteRefDocToRequirement(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds or deletes the source or resource doc/bookmark from the requirement. The 'isSourceRef' argument specifies whether the document is a 'source' document. The 'add' argument specifies whether the document is being added or removed from the requirement.
